name: Legend of Zesperia
description:
Fantasy, Turn-based, Story, RPG Maker,  Adventure, Action, Dungeon, Dragon, Visual Novel, Strategy, Choices.

The fantasy story that takes place in the Runeverse world tells a story of a man's journey on an unknown island called Dalmagia. There he encountered adventurers who shared his fate. In this world they teach that the power of an individual alone is not enough. They must unite in order to save the people closest to them, mainly the Runeverse people. As time passes, threats will come to destroy Runeverse world. It's all their fate to choose united in order to save Runeverse, otherwise the Runeverse world is destroyed. 

Thanks for RPG Maker MV, because all the engine systems I use come from RPG Maker MV.
